system.description:
You can use a bonus action to place a curse on a creature you can see within 30 feet. The curse lasts for 1 minute, and ends early if the target dies, you die, or you become incapacitated. The curse has the following effects:

  • When you deal damage against the cursed creature, it takes an additional 1d4 psychic damage. This bonus increases by 1d4 at 10th level, and again at 15th and 20th level.

  • You gain a pool of spectral dice, which begins empty. Each spectral die represents a sliver of spiritual power. When the cursed creature acquires a condition or a tracked condition it already has ticks up, add one spectral die to this pool. You can spend a spectral die when making an ability check tied to your spellcasting ability to gain a 1d4 bonus. For example, if you selected Wisdom for your spellcasting ability, you could use a spectral die to give yourself a bonus to a Wisdom (Perception) check. The pool disappears when you finish a short or long rest.

Once you have used this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
